vulnerabilities.description:
Reentrancy in reentrancy000.withdraw(uint256) (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#16-21):
	External calls:
	- (sent,None) = msg.sender.call{value: amount}() (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#18)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= amount (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#20)
	reentrancy000.balances (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#5) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- reentrancy000.balances (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#5)
	- reentrancy000.deposit() (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#7-10)
	- reentrancy000.getBalance(address) (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#12-14)
	- reentrancy000.withdraw(uint256) (data/synthetic/reentrancy/reentrancy_000/malicious.sol#16-21)
